resources.string: The received data could not be read
The server response contained no data
Try using a different username or password
What you searched for couldn\'t be found, try to search after something else.
The data stored needs an update

An error occurred while creating/loading the database. This means that the app will need to delete the previous one, and create a new one from scratch resulting in all of your saved data being deleted. We apologize for the inconvenience. Press the button below to continue.
You don\'t have any saved favorites. You can make a mushroom a favorite by swiping it to the left.
An error occurred while reading data from the disk
An error occurred while saving data to the disk
An error occurred while attempting to save the image to the temporary storage on your phone.
It was not possible to locate your location with a satisfactory accuracy.
It seems that there an error occurred with your device\'s GPS component.
You have not permitted the app to read your GPS location, which is necessary in order to show you this data.
To show you this data, the app needs to know where you are.
An unknown error occurred while trying to find your GPS location.
The response received from the server is not the one expected.
Your device seems to not have access to the internet.
The server can\'t handle such a big payload.
It seems that there is an issue with the server currently. Maybe it needs a hug?
The server took too long to answer. Try again, I might have been to impatient.
Your account could not be verified, you might need to login again.
Your coordinates could not be automatically determined, s√• you need to specify the location for your observation yourself.
Your coordinates have been determined, although it was not possible to find an appropriate location name. Please try again.
You need to specify what you have found. If you are not sure, you can press the butten \'Unknown species\'.
You need to specify a substrate
You need to specify a vegetationtype
You haven\'t allowed the app to read and write to your photolibrary. This can be changed in settings, but be aware that this restarts the app.
An unknown error occurred while trying to gain access to the chosen image.
An unknown error occurred while trying to save the image to your photo library.
This means you have more time to go find mushrooms
Hurry, get out there. Show us what you\'ve got.
You don\'t have any observations yet.
You are not logged in, and should not be able to what you\'re attempting to do.
Your login is no longer valid, login again.
You can give the app permission to use the camera in the settings.
If you are interested, your images can be put in an album for all the images you take using this app.
%s has now been marked as a favorite
You now have access to the mushroom and its images, even without internet - in the \'My favorites\' tab.
An added image seems to have been taken at a different time and place than now. Would you like to use the information from the image instead?\n\nThe GPS accuracy of the image: %.02f m
The location of your observation has been determined
